column5: Anybody using one..got one for Christmas ..pros cons
I got the Elite 7 HDI as well. (No x).  I can't wait to try it out!!
I have fished from a boat that had one mounted on the bow. The DI feature adds more clarity in regards to the structure you are viewing. Enjoy.
Thanks Fellas ..I'm sending it back today ..I'm trading it for the 7 gold combo ..I want the Gps
I've had one for about a year and a half and it works really well !! I am setting mine up on snowmobile to use the navionics charts for ice fishing.
I Have the gold combo.  With a screen that big gps is a must!  I'd do the same!

I have the X model and I am thrilled with it. I do have a separate unit with GPS so it is not an issue for me.  HOWEVER...the Gold option is the way I would go if I did it again. Simply for the SD card slot. With the X model, you are not able to update anything. Basically what you buy now is what you have for ever. Had I known that, I'd have gotten a GPS model
Yes at first I was pretty impressed by her choice ..but after a few days my needs kicked in ..and we sent it back for the gold combo ..it only makes sense
